name: The Legend Of The Ninja
description:
Fun little arcade platormer that deserves a try

-Simple but Challenging

Gamepad compatible (else use WASD, spacebar, arrow keys...)

Support me on Paypal at https://www.paypal.me/PaulDupire

It's about a kid disguising himself as a ninja, luke skywalker, kirby, and even more to escape the hard reality of his world.

Have fun
